entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You found the biolab ransacked and a datadisk on the dead biologist.
entries.journal_entry_description: Find Bera Jeza's employer and see if you can find any additional clues.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Find the Biolab where Bera Jeza worked.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The place has been ransacked and set on fire. See if you can find anything that may have been left behind.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: This is Derg Prantis and it may very well may be my last recording. I've barricaded myself in the biolab hoping to buy some time while I contact the authorities but someone is jamming my comm-signal. If you get this data disk, Bera, please take it to Cale Herron at Mos Taike. Oh no...please! I am unarmed...
